languages.text: "Волею Бога-Императора династии фон Валанциус дарован Патент. Идя против меня, вы идете против Бога-Императора. Маршал Стракс и префект Вультур приговариваются к смерти. Те, кто способствовал этому, разделят участь главных заговорщиков".

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."
languages.original_text: "Волею Бога-Императора династии фон Валанциус дарован Патент. Идя против меня, вы идете против Бога-Императора. Маршал Стракс и префект Вультур приговариваются к смерти. Те, кто способствовал этому, разделят участь главных заговорщиков".

traits.locale_text: "By God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted in this plot will be brought to account at a later trial to the fullest extent of the law."

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

Those who aided and abetted in this plot will be brought to account at a later trial to the fullest extent of the law."

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted in this plot will be brought to account at a later trial to the fullest extent of the law."

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted in this plot will share the same fate."

"By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

languages.text: "Der Dynastie derer von Valancius wurde im Namen des Gottimperators ein Handelsbrief gewährt. Wer sich gegen mich wendet, wendet sich auch gegen den Gottimperator. Marschall Strachs und Präfektin Vultur werden hiermit zum Tode verurteilt. Alle an beteiligten Personen wird dasselbe Schicksal ereilen."
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Der Dynastie derer von Valancius wurde im Namen des Gottimperators ein Handelsbrief gewährt. Wer sich gegen mich wendet, wendet sich auch gegen den Gottimperator. Marschall Strachs und Präfektin Vultur werden hiermit zum Tode verurteilt. Alle an beteiligten Personen wird dasselbe Schicksal ereilen."

languages.text: « C'est par la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que la dynastie von Valancius détient sa lettre de marque. S'attaquer à moi revient à s'attaquer à l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Je prononce donc une sentence de mort contre le maréchal Strachs et la préfète Vultur. Toute personne ayant participé à ce complot partagera le même sort. »
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: « C'est par la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que la dynastie von Valancius détient sa lettre de marque. S'attaquer à moi revient à s'attaquer à l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Je prononce donc une sentence de mort contre le maréchal Strachs et la préfète Vultur. Toute personne ayant participé à ce complot partagera le même sort. »

« C'est par la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que la dynastie von Valancius détient sa lettre de marque. S'attaquer à moi revient à s'attaquer à l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Je prononce donc une sentence de mort contre le maréchal Strachs et la préfète Vultur. Ceux qui les ont aidés dans cette entreprise devront ultérieurement répondre de leurs actes devant la justice et recevront le châtiment maximal prévu par la loi. »

« C'est par la volonté de l'Empereur-Dieu que la dynastie von Valancius détient sa lettre de marque. S'attaquer à moi revient à s'attaquer à l'Empereur-Dieu lui-même. Je prononce donc une sentence de mort contre le maréchal Strachs et la préfète Vultur. Ceux qui les ont aidés dans cette entreprise devront ultérieurement répondre de leurs actes devant la justice et recevront le châtiment maximal prévu par la loi. »

languages.text: “根据神皇本人的意愿，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获赐神圣贸易授状。违抗我，就等同于违抗神皇本人。我在此宣判斯塔克斯元帅与沃尔图尔行政官死刑。所有胆敢协助、教唆、参与这场阴谋的人，都会面临同样的下场。”
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: “根据神皇本人的意愿，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获赐神圣贸易授状。违抗我，就等同于违抗神皇本人。我在此宣判斯塔克斯元帅与沃尔图尔行政官死刑。所有胆敢协助、教唆、参与这场阴谋的人，都会面临同样的下场。”
“根据神皇本人的意愿，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获赐神圣贸易授状。违抗我，就等同于违抗神皇本人。我在此宣判斯塔克斯元帅与沃尔图尔行政官死刑。所有胆敢协助、教唆、参与这场阴谋的人，都会在接下来的审判中承担最大限度的法律责任。”
“根据神皇本人的意愿，冯·瓦兰修斯王朝获赐神圣贸易授状。违抗我，就等同于违抗神皇本人。我在此宣判斯塔克斯元帅与沃尔图尔行政官死刑。所有胆敢协助、教唆、参与这场阴谋的人，都会在接下来的审判中承担最大限度的法律责任。”

languages.text: «Por voluntad del Dios Emperador, la dinastía von Valancius fue agraciada con una Patente de Comercio. Oponerse a mí es oponerse al Dios Emperador. Por la presente, el Mariscal Strachs y la prefecta Vultur quedan condenados a muerte. Quienes hayan instigado y secundado esta conspiración compartirán su destino».
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: «Por voluntad del Dios Emperador, la dinastía von Valancius fue agraciada con una Patente de Comercio. Oponerse a mí es oponerse al Dios Emperador. Por la presente, el Mariscal Strachs y la prefecta Vultur quedan condenados a muerte. Quienes hayan instigado y secundado esta conspiración compartirán su destino».

«Por voluntad del Dios Emperador, la dinastía von Valancius fue agraciada con una Patente de Comercio. Oponerse a mí es oponerse al Dios Emperador. Por la presente, el Mariscal Strachs y la prefecta Vultur quedan condenados a muerte. Se exigirán explicaciones a quienes hayan instigado y secundado esta conspiración en un juicio posterior con todo el peso de la ley».

«Por voluntad del Dios Emperador, la dinastía von Valancius fue agraciada con una Patente de Comercio. Oponerse a mí es oponerse al Dios Emperador. Por la presente, el Mariscal Strachs y la prefecta Vultur quedan condenados a muerte. Se exigirán explicaciones a quienes hayan instigado y secundado esta conspiración en un juicio posterior con todo el peso de la ley».

languages.text: 「神帝陛下の御意志により、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝には通商令状が授けられた。{mf|俺|私}に刃向かうということは、神帝陛下に刃向かうことに他ならない。ストラッチス将帥とヴァルター総監に死刑を宣告する。この陰謀に加担した者たちは、同じ罰に処される」
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: 「神帝陛下の御意志により、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝には通商令状が授けられた。{mf|俺|私}に刃向かうということは、神帝陛下に刃向かうことに他ならない。ストラッチス将帥とヴァルター総監に死刑を宣告する。この陰謀に加担した者たちは、後の裁判にて法律が許す限り厳しく処罰されるだろう」
「神帝陛下の御意志により、フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝には通商令状が授けられた。{mf|俺|私}に刃向かうということは、神帝陛下に刃向かうことに他ならない。ストラッチス将帥とヴァルター総監に死刑を宣告する。この陰謀に加担した者たちは、後の裁判にて法律が許す限り厳しく処罰されるだろう」

languages.text: "Ticari Ruhsatname, Tanrı İmparator'un izniyle von Valancius hanedanlığına bahşedilmiştir. Bana karşı gelmek, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı gelmektir. Miralay Strachs ve Prefekt Vultur ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu kumpasta onlara yardım ve yataklıkta bulunan herkes, aynı kaderi paylaşacaktır."
languages.original_text: "By the God-Emperor's will, the von Valancius dynasty was granted a Warrant of Trade. Go against me, and you go against the God-Emperor. Marshal Strachs and Prefect Vultur are hereby sentenced to death. Those who aided and abetted them in this plot will share the same fate."

traits.locale_text: "Ticari Ruhsatname, Tanrı İmparator'un izniyle von Valancius hanedanlığına bahşedilmiştir. Bana karşı gelmek, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı gelmektir. Miralay Strachs ve Prefekt Vultur ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu kumpasta onlara yardım ve yataklıkta bulunan herkes, aynı kaderi paylaşacaktır."

"Ticari Ruhsatname, Tanrı İmparator'un izniyle von Valancius hanedanlığına bahşedilmiştir. Bana karşı gelmek, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı gelmektir. Miralay Strachs ve Prefekt Vultur ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu kumpasa yardım ve yataklıkta bulunan herkes bir başka duruşmada, yasaların el verdiği ölçüde yargılanacaktır."

"Ticari Ruhsatname, Tanrı İmparator'un izniyle von Valancius hanedanlığına bahşedilmiştir. Bana karşı gelmek, Tanrı İmparator'a karşı gelmektir. Miralay Strachs ve Prefekt Vultur ölüme mahkûm edilmiştir. Bu kumpasa yardım ve yataklıkta bulunan herkes bir başka duruşmada, yasaların el verdiği ölçüde yargılanacaktır."
